title: New: Gengahr – Powder
body:
Fresh from signing to Trangressive, as well as a host of festival appearances including a packed out BBC Introducing tent at Glastonbury, London quartet **Gengahr** have announced details of their next single, _Powder_, out toward the end of October.

A cleaner, crisper sound than experienced on their early demos, it’s less Alt-J than it is Youth Lagoon, or dare I say it, White Stripes, with it’s killer guitar lines coming courtesy of John Victor. Check out Powder below.
